description: Expose security vulnerabilities, deceptive constructs, and unfinished code before they reach production. Reveal architectural and design pattern usage with clear, actionable guidance to improve consistency and maintainability. Generate concise visual reports that highlight strengths and prioritize issues to speed up reviews and refactoring.

capabilities.name: analyze_code
capabilities.description: Analyze code for security issues, errors, deceptive patterns, and placeholders. Returns a structured analysis with issues and strengths.

capabilities.name: generate_report
capabilities.description: Analyze code and generate a detailed HTML report with visual indicators for issues and strengths.

capabilities.name: check_security
capabilities.description: Check code for security vulnerabilities only (hardcoded secrets, SQL injection, XSS, etc.)

capabilities.name: check_deceptive_patterns
capabilities.description: Check for code patterns that hide errors or create false confidence (empty catches, silent failures, etc.)

capabilities.name: check_placeholders
capabilities.description: Check for placeholder code, dummy data, TODO/FIXME comments, and incomplete implementations

capabilities.name: analyze_patterns
capabilities.description: Analyze code for architectural, design, and implementation patterns. Detects pattern usage, inconsistencies, and provides actionable suggestions for improvement.

capabilities.name: analyze_design_patterns
capabilities.description: Focused analysis of Gang of Four (GoF) design patterns in code. Detects Singleton, Factory, Observer, Strategy, and other classic patterns with confidence levels and implementation details.
